info.name: Denon Prime 4 - Mixxx Mapping
info.author: Levi "Whanake" Williams
info.description: This is a Work-In-Progress mapping to allow the Denon Prime 4 to be used with Mixxx, ideally with the same (if not more) functionality that the Prime 4 provides as a standalone device.
